title: Vaajra Kiran: Floral Diamond Bangle Set
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish
adorned with meticulously selected brilliant-cut Diamonds of VS clarity and G-H color.
features: This stunning bangle set features a delicate floral design, where each flower is composed of intricately set diamonds. The geometric gold framework adds a modern touch to the traditional kangan style. The design allows for optimal light reflection, maximizing the brilliance of the diamonds. Lightweight yet sturdy, ensuring comfortable wear.
colors: Radiant golden hue enhanced by the sparkling white diamonds creates a dazzling visual appeal.
occasions: festive celebrations like Sankranthi and Diwali
as well as formal events and everyday elegance.
description: This bangle set represents a fusion of tradition and modernity. The floral motifs are a timeless symbol of beauty and prosperity, while the geometric design adds a contemporary flair. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a distinctive luster, making it a cherished heirloom. Invest in a timeless piece that elevates any ensemble.
